attributes.action: withdraw British soldiers from Afghanistan & Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having just lost my brother, L/CPL Mike Jones in Afghanistan, it makes me begin to realise how we are losing both these wars, and terrorist attacks are getting worse by the day. We need to save our troops and withdraw them ASAP!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
